author: Sales Rep
content: Sarah is very interested in our enterprise solution. She mentioned they're looking to scale their operations significantly in Q2.

author: Account Manager
content: Follow-up meeting scheduled for next week. She wants to bring in the technical team to discuss integration requirements.

author: Sales Rep
content: Michael is very technical and asked detailed questions about our API capabilities. Sent him the developer documentation.

author: Technical Consultant
content: Had a great technical discussion. He's impressed with our scaling capabilities and security features.

author: Sales Rep
content: Emily is focused on operational efficiency. Highlighted our workflow automation features during the demo.

author: Marketing Specialist
content: David is interested in our marketing automation features. Scheduled a demo focused on campaign management.

author: Sales Director
content: Lisa is a key investor contact. She's very influential in the VC space and could provide valuable introductions.

author: Technical Consultant
content: Robert has strict security requirements. Need to prepare detailed security documentation for next meeting.

author: Sales Rep
content: Jennifer mentioned they're evaluating multiple solutions. Need to emphasize our competitive advantages.

author: Account Executive
content: Mark is the final decision maker. Very positive about our solution but wants to see ROI projections.
